chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the above problem.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

i cant open the tracking link.

Can you please send it again.

Thank you

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer. 

We are so sorry that you are unhappy with our product, as your product is still in transit, our logistics partner has suggested you to do the following.

1. Refuse the parcel when a delivery attempt is made.
2. If unable to refuse a parcel, do not open the product packaging. Use the return label provided by BackMarket and send the device back immediately.

By doing the following, you would be sure to receive a much FASTER REFUND for this order. 

Attached is  the tracking link for your reference: https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_de&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901191154/

Thank you.
Regards, 
TB

Dear ecomobile

the tracking link is not working.

Please check it

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have noticed this issue and brought it up with our logistics partner. We will rectify it and get back to you soon. Thank you.

Regards,
TB

Dear ecomobile

I will get back to you.

Please send me a valid and working tracking link today, otherwise we will have to initiate the refund at your expense

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The tracking link was unable to work as the order had been cancelled. We have refunded you the corresponding amount. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
